descriptions.long: Identify and group vocabulary words by category
descriptions.instruct: Choose a general category that will appear on the tree trunk. Fill in items that fit into that category and then a few decoy words.

recommendations.item: - Identify words that are from the same category (e.g. clothes, food items, days of the week)
- Pick which verbs are in a given tense
- Find all words of a given gender without using articles

examples.item: Category: Les Viands; Correct Items: l’orange, les fraises, la glace; Decoy Items: la grenouille, la vie
Category: Masculine; Correct Items: rex, equus, amor, puer; Decoy Items: tempus, corpus, manus

descriptions.short: Match the option for each question
descriptions.long: Choose the bubble that corresponds to the word or phrase on the boat
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Choose which article is appropriate for a noun (definite or indefinite)
- Select the adjective that matches the given noun
- Identify the case or part of speech of a word

descriptions.short: Two sets of multiple choice per question
descriptions.long: Choose from the options on the left and right cliffs which correspond to the given word
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Identify the number and gender of nouns
- Select the tense and voice of verbs
- Practice prepositions and the reasons for using them

descriptions.short: Multiple choice with one set of options
descriptions.long: Shoot the UFOs that correspond to the given phrase
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Practice finding the person and number of verbs
- Identify the correct case for words
- Match personal pronouns to verbs

descriptions.long: Choose the letters to spell vocabulary words correctly
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Translate vocabulary
- Practice spelling words
- Drill unique spelling patterns

descriptions.long: Find the appropriate match in this one-to-one matching game
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Practice Q&A situations
- Translate vocabulary
- Convert verbs into a different tense or mood

descriptions.long: Given only a fragment, recall and spell the full term
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Practice recognizing and spelling new vocabulary
- Given a verb, provide it in a different tense or mood

descriptions.short: Type in questions and appropriate responses
descriptions.long: Correctly spell out words and phrases
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Drill vocabulary
- Produce noun/ adj phrases in plural form
- Practice principal parts of words

descriptions.short: Type in questions and appropriate responses
descriptions.long: Unscramble refrigerator magnets to complete phrases
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Practice word order in Q&A situations
- Arrange words in conditional phrases
- Unscramble the words to formulate full sentences

descriptions.short: Type in questions and appropriate responses
descriptions.long: Correctly spell out words and phrases
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Drill vocabulary
- Produce noun/ adj phrases in plural form
- Practice principal parts of words

descriptions.long: Press the number keys that correspond to the numbers written in the target language
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Practice the numbers 1-10, 100, and 1,000

descriptions.long: Record audio clips for your students to listen to at any time
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Record dialogues in the target language
- Record short stories

descriptions.long: Find the pairs that match in this Concentration-style game with cards
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Drill vocabulary
- Practice identifying matches
- Explore new language patterns and vocabulary

descriptions.long: Select the correct multiple choice answer to quiz questions
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Practice culture questions
- Prepare for tests

descriptions.long: Ask students to identify individual parts of a sentence
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Practice with cases, tenses, moods
- Drill parts of speech
- Find the correct form of a word out of a group of phrases

descriptions.long: Find the items on the shopping list
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Practice identifying new vocabulary
- Match words to corresponding pictures
- Play with things you can buy in the store

descriptions.long: Shoot the correct balloon with the slingshot
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Practice prepositions
- Study elisions in phrases
- Play multiple choice games

descriptions.short: Students must unscramble letters of a given term
descriptions.long: Unscramble the letters correctly to spell words and phrases
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field there

recommendations.item: - Practice translating and spelling
- Study language and spelling patterns, explore new vocabulary

descriptions.short: Students type in answers and group them
descriptions.long: Type in appropriate answers to questions, then group the answers into basketball hoops
descriptions.instruct: Fill in this field here, and that field here, and that field therethere

recommendations.item: - Translate verbs then identify the tense
- Spell vocabulary and categorize parts of speech
